Tamanu:
Literal `
These are the Allergies for ${Patient.firstname} ${Patient.lastName} for ${AllergyIntolerance.code.coding[0].display}. Please review the data for more detail.
`
Example: These are the Allergies for ${Patient.firstname} ${Patient.lastName} for ${AllergyIntolerance.code.coding[0].display}. Please review the data for more detail.

Notes:
Please make these values configurable in default.json in:
- hl7.dataDictionaries.ips.vaccinationEncoding: "http://nzmt.org.nz"
- hl7.dataDictionaries.ips.absentUnknown: "http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/ips/CodeSystem/absent-unknown-uv-ips"
